dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
AWS ParallelCluster is an AWS supported Open Source cluster management
tool to deploy and manage HPC clusters in the AWS cloud.
dependent_to.name: aws-parallelcluster

dependent_to.description:
MIVisionX toolkit is a set of comprehensive computer vision and machine
intelligence libraries, utilities, and applications bundled into a
single toolkit.
dependent_to.name: mivisionx

dependent_to.description:
ADB-Enhanced is a Swiss-army knife for Android testing and development.
A command-line interface to trigger various scenarios like screen
rotation, battery saver mode, data saver mode, doze mode, permission
grant/revocation.
dependent_to.name: py-adb-enhanced

dependent_to.description:
AMPL API is an interface that allows developers to access the features
of the AMPL interpreter from within a programming language. All model
generation and solver interaction is handled directly by AMPL, which
leads to great stability and speed; the library just acts as an
intermediary, and the added overhead (in terms of memory and CPU usage)
depends mostly on how much data is read back from AMPL, the size of the
model as such is irrelevant.
dependent_to.name: py-amplpy

dependent_to.description: git annex special remotes made easy.
dependent_to.name: py-annexremote

dependent_to.description:
ANUGA (pronounced "AHnooGAH") is open-source software for the simulation
of the shallow water equation, in particular it can be used to model
tsunamis and floods.
dependent_to.name: py-anuga

dependent_to.description: Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming.
dependent_to.name: py-apache-beam

dependent_to.description:
Autograd can automatically differentiate native Python and Numpy code.
It can handle a large subset of Python's features, including loops, ifs,
recursion and closures, and it can even take derivatives of derivatives
of derivatives. It supports reverse-mode differentiation (a.k.a.
backpropagation), which means it can efficiently take gradients of
scalar-valued functions with respect to array-valued arguments, as well
as forward-mode differentiation, and the two can be composed
arbitrarily. The main intended application of Autograd is gradient-based
optimization. For more information, check out the tutorial and the
examples directory.
dependent_to.name: py-autograd

dependent_to.description:
The BIOM file format (canonically pronounced biome) is designed to be a
general-use format for representing biological sample by observation
contingency tables.
dependent_to.name: py-biom-format

dependent_to.description: Bluebrain Python Optimisation Library
dependent_to.name: py-bluepyopt

dependent_to.description:
commonmark.py is a pure Python port of jgm's commonmark.js, a Markdown
parser and renderer for the CommonMark specification, using only native
modules.
dependent_to.name: py-commonmark

dependent_to.description:
A command-line utility that creates projects from cookiecutters (project
templates). E.g. Python package projects, jQuery plugin projects.
dependent_to.name: py-cookiecutter

dependent_to.description: Blazing fast correlation functions on the CPU.
dependent_to.name: py-corrfunc

dependent_to.description:
Reorganising NIfTI files from dcm2niix into the Brain Imaging Data
Structure.
dependent_to.name: py-dcm2bids

dependent_to.description: Library for interaction with and instrumentation of remote devices.
dependent_to.name: py-devlib

dependent_to.description: Google Earth Engine Batch Asset Manager.
dependent_to.name: py-gee-asset-manager

dependent_to.description: Google Earth Engine Batch Assets Manager with Addons.
dependent_to.name: py-geeadd

dependent_to.description: Simple Client for Earth Engine Uploads with Selenium Support.
dependent_to.name: py-geeup

dependent_to.description: Geocoder is a simple and consistent geocoding library.
dependent_to.name: py-geocoder

dependent_to.description:
HAplotype and PHylodynamics pipeline for viral assembly, population
genetics, and phylodynamics.
dependent_to.name: py-haphpipe

dependent_to.description: Library for getting your data into HEPData
dependent_to.name: py-hepdata-lib

dependent_to.description:
Hyperopt is a Python library for serial and parallel optimization over
awkward search spaces, which may include real-valued, discrete, and
conditional dimensions.
dependent_to.name: py-hyperopt

dependent_to.description:
An interactive toolkit for assembly and analysis of restriction-site
associated genomic data sets (e.g., RAD, ddRAD, GBS) for population
genetic and phylogenetic studies.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyrad

dependent_to.description: lz-string for python.
dependent_to.name: py-lzstring

dependent_to.description:
Matminer is a library for performing data mining in the field of
materials science.
dependent_to.name: py-matminer

dependent_to.description:
Flexible metadata store for MLOps, built for research and production
teams that run a lot of experiments.
dependent_to.name: py-neptune-client

dependent_to.description:
Netpyne: A python package to facilitate the development, parallel
simulation, optimization and analysis of multiscale biological neuronal
networks in NEURON.
dependent_to.name: py-netpyne

dependent_to.description: An extensible framework for program autotuning.
dependent_to.name: py-opentuner

dependent_to.description: OSQP: The Operator Splitting QP Solver
dependent_to.name: py-osqp

dependent_to.description:
Petastorm is a library enabling the use of Parquet storage from
Tensorflow, Pytorch, and other Python-based ML training frameworks.
dependent_to.name: py-petastorm

dependent_to.description:
This repository contains a Python package named PostCactus for
postprocessing data from numerical simulations performed with the
Einstein Toolkit.
dependent_to.name: py-postcactus

dependent_to.description:
ProjectQ is an open-source software framework for quantum computing
started at ETH Zurich. It allows users to implement their quantum
programs in Python using a powerful and intuitive syntax. ProjectQ can
then translate these programs to any type of back-end, be it a simulator
run on a classical computer of an actual quantum chip.
dependent_to.name: py-projectq

dependent_to.description: Library for communicating with the GA4GH Task Execution API.
dependent_to.name: py-py-tes

dependent_to.description: Python Cortical mapping software for fMRI data.
dependent_to.name: py-pycortex

dependent_to.description:
PyDMD is a Python package that uses Dynamic Mode Decomposition for a
data-driven model simplification based on spatiotemporal coherent
structures.
dependent_to.name: py-pydmd

dependent_to.description:
pyglet is a cross-platform windowing and multimedia library for Python
for developing games and other visually rich applications.
dependent_to.name: py-pyglet

dependent_to.description:
pyGPs is a Python library for Gaussian Process (GP) Regression and
Classification.
dependent_to.name: py-pygps

dependent_to.description: Convenient reader for Matlab mat files.
dependent_to.name: py-pymatreader

dependent_to.description:
Python-bioformats is a Python wrapper for Bio-Formats, a standalone Java
library for reading and writing life sciences image file formats. Bio-
Formats is capable of parsing both pixels and metadata for a large
number of formats, as well as writing to several formats.
dependent_to.name: py-python-bioformats

dependent_to.description: PyTorch Lightning is the lightweight PyTorch wrapper for ML researchers.
dependent_to.name: py-pytorch-lightning

dependent_to.description: A Python object for standardized reference genome assets.
dependent_to.name: py-refgenconf

dependent_to.description: Fortran domain and autodoc extensions to Sphinx
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-fortran

dependent_to.description:
tensorflow/datasets is a library of datasets ready to use with
TensorFlow.
dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow-datasets

dependent_to.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.
dependent_to.name: py-torch

dependent_to.description:
A minimalist tree manipulation and plotting library for use inside
jupyter notebooks. Toytree combines a popular tree data structure based
on the ete3 library with modern plotting tools based on the toyplot
plotting library.
dependent_to.name: py-toytree

dependent_to.description: A Python client for the tus resumable upload protocol -> http://tus.io
dependent_to.name: py-tuspy

dependent_to.description:
UCSF pyem is a collection of Python modules and command-line utilities
for electron microscopy of biological samples.
dependent_to.name: py-ucsf-pyem

dependent_to.description: Tools for handling Unique Molecular Identifiers in NGS data sets
dependent_to.name: py-umi-tools

dependent_to.description:
Transparent calculations with uncertainties on the quantities involved
(aka error propagation); fast calculation of derivatives
dependent_to.name: py-uncertainties

dependent_to.description:
Workload Automation (WA) is a framework for executing workloads and
collecting measurements on Android and Linux devices.
dependent_to.name: py-workload-automation

dependent_to.description: Wrappers for Python builtins with higher-level APIs.
dependent_to.name: py-ww

dependent_to.description:
topaz: Pipeline for particle picking in cryo-electron microscopy images
using convolutional neural networks trained from positive and unlabeled
examples. Also featuring micrograph and tomogram denoising with DNNs.
dependent_to.name: topaz

dependent_to.description: YODA - Yet more Objects for Data Analysis
dependent_to.name: yoda

description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2
name: py-future

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
